channel.title: COVID-19 on NewsStreet
channel.description: Recent content in COVID-19 on NewsStreet

item.title: Children’s hospitals fill up amid up early surge in respiratory infections
item.description: Children’s hospitals fill up amid up early surge in respiratory infections Now is the time to get flu shots as well as COVID boosters, experts advise.

item.title: Anxiety disorders had no effect on vaccine hesitancy
item.description: Anxiety disorders had no effect on vaccine hesitancy These findings help shed light on the best way for the government to promote vaccination.
